content: --ज्ञ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} --विद् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} knowing the weak or vulnerable points of another; <ls>Pt. 1. 248.</ls> {2} knowing the most secret portions of a subject. {3} knowing secrets or mysteries. {4} having a deep insight into anything, exceedingly acute or clever. (--ज्ञः any acute or learned man.
